lender.occupational_info: Our bodies are composed of over 75% water. No surprize water can have a profound effect on us all. Not all water is created equal. You have to drink water any so...why not drink a clean, crisp, ionized, alkaline, anti oxident water that hydrates truly and refreshes as it brings our bodies back into balance. Change your water, change your life. Drink Kangen Water.

lender.name: WMC
lender.loan_because: We would like to help the people in Vietnam in gratitude for the mindfulness teachings that Thich Nhat Hanh has brought to the West.
lender.occupational_info:
The Washington Mindfulness Community, formed in 1989, is composed of men and women inspired by the teachings of Buddhism and of Thich Nhat Hanh, a contemporary Vietnamese Zen Master, peace activist and writer.
The mission of the Community is to nurture mindfulness, love, and understanding among those who participate in its activities and in the larger society.
Members come together to meditate, to deepen their understanding of the practice of mindfulness, to encourage and inspire each other through dharma discussions and mindful actions, to support each other through difficult times, and to celebrate the joys and wonders of life.
Recognizing that each person's peace and happiness are interwoven with the peace and happiness of others, the Washington Mindfulness Community offers activities that welcome the children, families, and companions of members. The community also organizes retreats, lectures, and other public events; supports communities and causes in accord with the Community's mission; and works with groups that relieve suffering through compassionate actions.
The WMC is incorporated as a Maryland non-profit religious institution, and all gifts are tax-deductible. The governing structure of the community includes a Practice Council, which makes decisions impacting community mindfulness practices and community life, and a Board of Directors.

lender.name: GLENN
lender.loan_because: I want to start my own truck driving buisness. I'll need at least 30,000 to get started. I have taken steps in preparing the foundation for the buisness by; establishing good buisness credit, my company name is P.H.A.T. TRANSPORT LLC. , I have my tax ID number and I'm lincensed and registered in the state of TX. I've been driving trucks for over 6 yrs so I know everything about them you can know and I'm confident I can run a successful trucking company. Being a single dad of 2, I want to see this come to pass for financial stability and to maintain consistent employment in an unstable economy. The loan I'm requesting will be used to purchase trucks and trailers, office space and supplies, and fuel for transportation for over the road driving.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am a hard working local driver in my area that makes various delivers to surronding buisness. We deliver house keeping products to major buisness when needed. My deliveries take make all over Houston and usually run over an 8-9 hour day. My job requires alot of manual labor, lifting, loading, unloading, and maintaining a record of all deliveries. I must run on time and accurate for the items expected to their destinations.

lender.occupational_info: I work hard every day mostly in the demolition and construction industry.

lender.name: Rossland Sec School
lender.loan_because: On behalf of our three Grade 6 and 7 classes the students decided to loan their field trip fund raising money to help those less fortunate than themsleves. In lieu of an expensive out of town field trip they chose to stay closer to home and use the money, $1500 to support various causes.
lender.occupational_info: We teach in a small, rather remote community of less than 4000 people. Our school is Grade 6 -12 and education in Canada is publicly funded. Our main industry is downhill skiing at Red Mountain.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because:
I believe people have ideas that need to be set free, to impact others.
I have a heart out for non profit organizations and church's.
lender.occupational_info: I am a designer and writer. Working with a small company me and my friends began almost two years ago. Doing design, web development, photography, and promotional advertising for others.

lender.name: Rolf
lender.loan_because: Tithing and seeding...empowering self-reliance.
lender.occupational_info: Filmmaker & Therapist

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: Poverty sucks and everyone just needs a break - we can all help.
lender.occupational_info: I read The Bottom Billion, then Mohammed Yunus, then Giving by Bill Clinton and found Kiva. I am hooked- what a brill idea!!

lender.name: keith
lender.whereabouts: harlem new york new york city

lender.name: Misha
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.occupational_info: I am an California based photographer, however, am available for travel anywhere on the planet. I specialize in artistic wedding photography and portraits.

lender.name: matthew
lender.loan_because: You gotta help people out, son.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: It's fun!

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: it can make a huge difference in someone's life. It takes a village.....

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I need a loan because I am in the construction industry and times are tough. I started my company 2 years ago and was very successful for the first year. But, with the economy the way it is, it is harder to get work now therefore I cannot pay the company's bills anymore. I have complete confidence in this company. I have put everything I have into it with no regrets. I believe we have a very good future ahead of us, We have a number of very big potential jobs that will keep us going for along time and give us the boost we need to survive. But right now like many other small business owners, I cannot get a loan anywhere to be able to get there. I need this loan so I can build this company into what I know it can be. Thank you for your consideration and good luck to all business owners.
lender.occupational_info: Our company does Residential and Commercial remodeling and building. We take a project from start to finish, From Foundation to Paint. We also do project management and Consulting.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: my friends made me do it

lender.name: Steen
lender.loan_because: I know I can make a difference in the world one loan at the time.
lender.occupational_info: Sharing the opportunity of Shaklee and helping people change their lives and improve their health.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: My grandparents were farmers, mechanics, carpenters, and worked hard to provide better lives for their families and communities. I have seen first-hand how difficult this is, and how well they succeeded, and want to assist others who are doing the same.
lender.occupational_info:
I maintain computer networks.
Unlike my grandfather, I will probably never lose fingers at my job!

lender.name: Jacquie
lender.loan_because: I believe there is enough money to go around in the world if we all share
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hospital as a journalist

lender.name: Elias
lender.loan_because: "Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person." Mother Teresa

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I'd like to think it makes a difference

lender.name: La Kia
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist... pure an simple. I have been commissioned to create school emblems, corporate and personal logos, memorials, murals, photo manipulation, wedding invitations, t - shirts... etc...
